thread.title: Watch Calvin Harris Break Down “Slide” ft. Frank Ocean and Migos
thread.title_full: Watch Calvin Harris Break Down “Slide” ft. Frank Ocean and Migos

author: Bianca Giulione
title: Watch Calvin Harris Break Down “Slide” ft. Frank Ocean and Migos
text:
Want to catch a glimpse into the mind of one of the best pop producers of our time? Look no further, as Scottish hit wizard Calvin Harris graciously shared two minutes and thirteen seconds of his process creating “Slide,” a certifiable summer banger featuring none other than Frank Ocean and Migos . We love it so much, it was one of our Best Tracks of February .
Slide is out now ! 
A post shared by Calvin Harris (@calvinharris) on Mar 5, 2017 at 10:25am PST 

Calvin Harris managed to take time out of his busy pop producer schedule to record a video for Twitter, breaking down each part of the sun-drenched, 80s new wave-influenced perfection that is “Slide.” Check him out recording each catchy riff on the piano, guitar and crazy synths, and listen to Frank Ocean’s flawless isolated vocal takes below.
How I made Slide pic.twitter.com/dwu1NgVwFL 
— Calvin Harris (@CalvinHarris) March 19, 2017 

Listen to “Slide” ft. Frank Ocean and Migos in all its glory below.

In other music news, Drake dropped ‘More Life’ a few days ago, check out the full production credits here .
